thread.title: Video of a mini horse eating in a HIGHCHAIR sparks outrage | Daily Mail Online
thread.title_full: Video of a mini horse eating in a HIGHCHAIR sparks outrage | Daily Mail Online

author: Clemence Michallon For Dailymail.Com
title: Video of a mini horse eating in a HIGHCHAIR sparks outrage | Daily Mail Online
text: 'What is wrong with people who can do this to an innocent animal?' Video of a miniature horse eating in a HIGH CHAIR sparks online outrage Clip of a miniature horse surfaced on social media last week and is going viral Shows the animal in a high chair that looks like it made for a baby The horse can be seen eating what appears to be bits of carrot from a bowl Many people left outraged comments saying the video showed animal abuse But some have defended it saying the technique is used for pets who have a dysfunctional esophagus
